column7: 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions. 2. Slice chicken into thin strips. 3. Sauté chicken in olive oil. 4. Add garlic and tomato sauce. 5. Combine with pasta.
1. Cube tofu. 2. Chop vegetables. 3. Heat oil in wok. 4. Stir fry tofu and vegetables. 5. Add soy sauce and ginger.
1. Brown beef chunks. 2. Add chopped vegetables. 3. Pour in beef broth. 4. Simmer for 2 hours. 5. Season to taste.
1. Marinate chicken with spices. 2. Sauté chicken in butter. 3. Add tomato puree and cream. 4. Simmer until cooked. 5. Serve with naan or rice.
1. Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices. 2. Layer rice and chicken in a pot. 3. Cook with dum (steam) method. 4. Garnish with fried onions and saffron. 5. Serve hot.
1. Boil lentils until soft. 2. Prepare tadka with garlic, onion, and spices. 3. Mix tadka with boiled lentils. 4. Simmer and serve with rice or roti.
1. Chop potatoes and cauliflower. 2. Sauté ginger and spices. 3. Add vegetables and cook until tender. 4. Garnish with cilantro and serve.
1. Blanch spinach and grind to a paste. 2. Sauté onion, tomato, and spices. 3. Add spinach paste and paneer cubes. 4. Cook and serve with roti or naan.
1. Boil chickpeas until tender. 2. Prepare masala with onion, tomato, and spices. 3. Combine with chickpeas. 4. Prepare bhature dough, roll, and deep fry. 5. Serve together.
1. Soak and grind rice and lentils for batter. 2. Steam batter in idli molds. 3. Prepare sambar by cooking vegetables with lentils and spices. 4. Serve idli with sambar and chutney.
1. Prepare dough with flour and water. 2. Make filling with boiled potatoes, peas, and spices. 3. Shape dough into cones, fill, and seal. 4. Deep fry until golden brown.
